revised_title: Endothelial Cells and Platelet Interactions in Vascular Biology
tldr: This article explores the interaction between platelets and endothelial cells, focusing on the role of prostacyclin in inhibiting platelet aggregation. The authors demonstrate that endothelial cells can synthesize prostacyclin from arachidonic acid, which has implications for vascular biology and understanding the mechanisms of blood clotting.
